glsa.title: GNU Readline: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU Readline, the worst of which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed in.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU Readline. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU Readline users should upgrade to the latest version:
